courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: BADM 332 must be completed in previous fall semester. Junior or senior class standing.
description: Sustainable Product Design and Marketing Plan Development: Project based course focusing on systematic approach for designing sustainable products and developing business plans that address the issues of economic, social and ecological sustainability; covers concept generation and evaluation, detailed design, cost modeling, testing and prototyping, and sustainable business plan development; also a continuing course for students enrolled in sustainable product and market development for subsistence marketplaces. Prerequisite: BADM 332 must be completed in previous fall semester. Junior or senior class standing.
label: Mktg Innov for Sub Mktplaces
